Fault.name: Mediators/RouteRequest.mplan
Fault.msg: Assigning source "{http://www.globalcompany.com/ns/CCAuthorizationService}CCNumber" and target "{http://xmlns.oracle.com/pcbpel/adapter/db/top/gettCreditValidation}ccnb" of different QName which may generate non-valid xml as per the xsd in case of non-leaf node. If required verify manually
